*Analysis*

```{r}
filtered_data = ds_patches %>%
  filter(
    metaecosystem == "no",
    time_point >= first_time_point_model,
    time_point <= last_time_point_model
  )
```

```{r}
plot.patches.points(filtered_data,
                    patch_type_input,
                    response_variable)
```

**Construct the full model**

```{r}
full_model = lmer(
  get(response_variable) ~
    day +
    patch_size_ml +
    patch_size_ml : day +
    (day | culture_ID),
  data = filtered_data,
  REML = FALSE,
  control = lmerControl(optimizer = "Nelder_Mead")
)

summary(full_model)
plot(full_model)
qqnorm(resid(full_model))
```

-   Test `patch_size_ml` and `patch_size_ml : day`

```{r}
null_model = lmer(
  get(response_variable) ~
    day +
    (day | culture_ID),
  data = filtered_data,
  REML = FALSE,
  control = lmerControl(optimizer = "Nelder_Mead")
)

summary(null_model)
plot(null_model)
qqnorm(resid(null_model))
stats = compute.model.stats(full_model,
                            null_model,
                            "mixed_model")

stats

results_table = fill.results.table(results_table,
                                   response_variable,
                                   patch_type_input,
                                   model_stats)
```
